check_for_updates.name: Check for updates
check_for_updates.description: Check for updates when launching this program.

use_local_installations.name: Use local installations
use_local_installations.description: When a Roblox update is available, this setting can be enabled to check "%localappdata%/Roblox/Versions" and copy updates from this directory if they have already been installed

force_roblox_reinstallation.name: Force Roblox reinstallation
force_roblox_reinstallation.description: Force Roblox to reinstall, useful after disabling a mod to make sure all modded files get restored.

always_update_roblox.name: Always reinstall Roblox
always_update_roblox.description: The same as "Force Roblox reinstallation", but stays enabled.
